}}'''Pimpernel Took''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Pimpernel was the second child of [[Thain]] [[Paladin Took II]] and [[Eglantine Banks]]. She and her family were guests at [[Bilbo's Farewell Party]].<ref>{{App|Took}}</ref>
 
==Etymology==
[[wikipedia:Anagallis|Pimpernel]] is a genus of the primrose family and its fruits resemble peppercorns. The name derives from Latin ''pimpernella'' meaning "little pepper".<ref>{{HM|IE}}, "Giving of Names"</ref>
